name: Midnight Snack (baxterdeni)
description:
In this game, you play as a lizard in the nighttime desert trying to get a bite to eat. In order to win, you need to eat 10 bugs with your tongue. There are obstacles in your path, though.

As a cold-blooded lizard, your body temperature is continually decreasing due to the cold desert night. Stand near a campfire to warm yourself up and avoid death. 

There is also a dangerous bird circling above, don't get caught in its shadow or it'll be the end for you. 

Thanks for playing and hope you enjoy! This game was made for Spartasoft's 2022 Summer Game Jam.

Credits:

By Anna Sheahan, David Gakodi, Kelsi Levine, Peter Liu, Justin Denard, Baxter Deni, Michael Prater, and Logan Bates.
